xva_engine.simulation.risk_factors.ir.calibration_historical module

class xva_engine.simulation.risk_factors.ir.calibration_historical.HistoricalCalibConfig(lam=0.08, shift_bp=100.0, return_horizon_days=5, day_count=365.0)[source]

Bases: object

Minimal historical calibration config. - lam: fixed mean reversion (global) for now (can be per pillar later) - shift_bp: fixed shift (global or per pillar) for now - return_horizon_days: sampling horizon for log-returns (e.g. 5 business days)

lam: float = 0.08
shift_bp: float = 100.0
return_horizon_days: int = 5
day_count: float = 365.0
